thread.section_title: Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: a very good hotel
thread.title_full: a very good hotel - Review of Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tacianal2017
title: a very good hotel
text: Despite the fact that I've found the room a little bit small for a family of 3 persons, this hotel is perfect to discover Paris and its monuments walking. We didn't need to take the bus or the subway, which is at 2 minutes of the hotel. The personal is very nice and profesional. We will back here in our next trip in Paris.
